channel.title: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.description: Discover what this Cap'n Hugo theme be all about. Gett'n StartedInitialize yer website 'n a few simple steps

item.title: Shorrrtcodes
item.description: Cap'n Hugo uses Marrrkdown as its rrrambl'n format. However, there be a lot o' th'ns that Marrrkdown doesnâ€™t support well.
